article_title: Kerry Visits Lebanon in Show of U.S. Support
article_text:
BEIRUT—In a visit here Wednesday, U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry pledged support to Lebanon as it struggles to cope with pressures from the Syrian civil war next door, calling its security critical to the region and U.S. interests.

Mr. Kerry, speaking at a news conference during his one-day visit to Beirut, also called the Syrian presidential vote held Tuesday "meaningless" and a "nonelection" that didn't...
